body.para: Hi Iooked at your envelope and I was wondering if you would be able to add an extra element( for example myName element) in the hello element without having serializer problems. If it works for you could you send me the code please.
Manish Saha <Manish@ivl.stpt To: soap-user@xml.apache.org .soft.net> cc: Subject: sending object as parameter 12/04/2001 05:36 Please respond to soap-user
i can sent the message to the server that
i am invoking the hello function with the MyName object parameter but the server is throwing a error
when the hello function is having a object as parameter in hand how is it looking for hello(string).
what is the factor that governs the function invocation parameter.
